Package theLegendOfFinn.view.menu

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameOverRenderer
    Manages the renderization of the game over view
    MapSelectionRenderer
    Manages the map selection renderization
    MenuOption
    Represent an option for the flow of the game
    MenuRenderer
    Parent of all the menu renderers in the game.
    ModeRenderer
    Managed the selection of the game mode
    PauseRenderer
    Manages the game's pause mode
    StartingMenuRenderer
    Manages the game's starting menu.
